trans-unit.target:
Hello %title% %lastname%,

Thank you for registering for TransportTalent.com. We appreciate your interest in our services.

What are the next steps?

1. Set up your free company profile to present your company to interested candidates.

2. Book our service "Job Board Subscription" to have your job openings automatically posted on our site.

3. Have us highlight certain positions and find the right candidate for you with our product "Active Sourcing".

4. Leave the whole recruiting process to us and onlycommunicate with candidates meeting your requirements.

If you have any questions, we are happy to answer them at support@transporttalent.com.

Kind regards,

Ulrich Nissen
Managing Director
